Typealiases.html#/s:15SimplyCoreAudio10S.name: StereoPair
Typealiases.html#/s:15SimplyCoreAudio10S.abstract: Represents a pair of stereo channel numbers.

Structs/VolumeInfo.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.name: volume
Structs/VolumeInfo.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.abstract: Returns an scalar volume, or nil if unavailable.

Structs/VolumeInfo.html.name: VolumeInfo
Structs/VolumeInfo.html.abstract: This struct holds volume, mute, and playthru information about a given channel and scope of an AudioDevice.

Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.name: line
Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.abstract: The ID for a terminal type of a line level stream.

Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.abstract: A stream from/to a digital audio interface as defined by ISO 60958 (aka SPDIF or AES/EBU).

Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.name: receiverSpeaker

Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.name: receiverMicrophone
Enums/TerminalType.html#/s:15SimplyCoreA.abstract: A microphone on a telephone handset receiver

Enums/Scope.html.name: Scope
Enums/Scope.html.abstract: Indicates the scope used by an AudioDevice or AudioStream.

Enums/TerminalType.html.name: TerminalType
Enums/TerminalType.html.abstract: Indicates the terminal type used by an AudioStream.

Enums/TransportType.html.name: TransportType
Enums/TransportType.html.abstract: Indicates the transport type used by an AudioDevice.

Classes/SimplyCoreAudio.html#/s:15Simply.abstract: All the devices that are aggregate devices.

Classes/AudioStream.html#/s:15SimplyCore.name: active

Classes/AudioStream.html#/s:15SimplyCore.name: latency

Classes/AudioStream.html#/s:15SimplyCore.name: virtualFormat

Classes/AudioStream.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: All the available virtual formats for this audio stream matching the current virtual format’s sample rate.

Classes/AudioObject.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: The audio object’s name as reported by Core Audio.

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.name: name
Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: The audio device’s name as reported by Core Audio.

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: All the subdevices of this aggregate device

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: All the subdevices of this aggregate device that support output

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: All the audio devices related to this audio device.

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: Attempts to set the pid that currently owns exclusive access to the

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: Attempts to make the audio device available to all processes by setting

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.name: isOutputOnlyDevice
Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: Whether the device has only outputs but no inputs.

Classes/AudioDevice.html#/s:15SimplyCore.abstract: Returns a String representation of self.
